Returns the version data of the REL data

Returns:

INT32 DrmRelParser::Parse (   ) 
 

Parses the REL data based on the type of encoding ie XML/WBXML. Stores the parsed data in compressed form in the APOXI DRM engine.

Returns:
status - TRUE on success, parsing status on error eg DrmCorruptMessage etc...
